title: Riot, why does Fiora look like Taric now? Are they twins now?

makes the new royal  guard skin even better xD

Guys... I'm trying to get a Fiora skin boycott thing going.  If you dislike her new VU, check this out.  http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/Z6JN2oEX-urging-all-fiora-players-come-make-your-voices-heard

If this new fiora model comes out i want a refund! Its literally going backwards! She is hideous now!
I did not but royal guard to get something ugly if anything dont even remodel her just keep her as she is and change her kit holy fuck. Im ok with the classic designs change
but this is just terrible and insulting. we need to be heard and clearly we fucking haven't we should riot (ironic really...) if our demands aren't met cause we are the people who this game is meant for. We are not just players but customers as well we have the right to good service and we as the people have the right to make our voices heard. Without us there is no Riot games! We should all vote on this matter and have them fix this abysmal and unacceptable change to fiora's model and if they do not change we should leave the game and no longer attend the lcs events until our demands are met! Less people playing and buying merchandise, less people buying skins, less people attending the lcs, no more money for riot.
She looks nothing like Taric, stop trying to find every reason to make the Fiora update look bad.
Yet everyone else seems to agree that she does look like Taric. I don't know how you don't see it.
lore revamp?
